divs: Sighting DetailsIt was bright, magnetic and pulling. I was in the woods of souther Indiana, and the lights stunned me into submission to it's magnetic pull. I couldn't move. I was frozen in time and place, suspended as though I were a piece of pear in a lime jello mixture. It has never left my mind, and I have frequent, recurrent flashbacks of the sighting.
Summary: It was bright and compelling. I felt powerless in the grip of it's shadow and light.
